newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech premier calls unexpected news conference.
newsitem.headline: Czech premier calls unexpected news conference.

text.p: Czech Prime Minister Vaclav Klaus has called an extraordinary news conference for 7.30 p.m. (1730 gmt), his office said in a statement on Monday without elaborating.

Klaus, who leads the senior Civic Democratic Party (ODS) in the three party centre-right ruling coalition, has been involved in talks with the leaders of the two junior parties since agreeing to make changes in the cabinet last week.
